bibl.title: Petitioner v. Defendant. Order of Discharge
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: In the Superior Court of the State of Washington for the County of King JUVENILE COURT
IN RE THE WELFARE OF GLADYS HAWK Ward of the Court} No.4385 ORDER OF DISCHARGE

Now, on this 10th day of uly, 1916 this matter coming on regularly for hearing upon appliction of LIlburn Merrill, chief probaiton officer of this cCourt, in behalf of Gladys Hawk, a ward of the Court, who heretofore, to writ; on the 20th day of Novemeber, 1914, was committed to the temporary custody of the gGirls' Parental School; and it appearing to the Court that said child was thereafter, to-writ; on the 10th day of January, 1916, temporarily paroled for said Girls' Parental sSchool to Mrs. C.E. Hunt, 2343- 44th Avenue Southwest, Seattle; and it further appearing to the Court that the said Gladya Hawk was recently married
IT IS THERFORE ORDERED by the Court that the said Gladya Hawk be, ad she hereby is, discharged from the custody of the Girls' Parental School and from further supervision of the Court.
Recorded in January Book B. page 30.
In the Superior COurt of the State of Washington FOR THE COUNTY OF KING
STATE OF WASHINGON COUNTY OF KING} SS.
IN THE MATTER OF THE WELFARE OF GLADYS HAWK WARD OF COURT.} NO.4385

I, W. K. SICKELS, County Clerk of King County, and ex-officio clerk of the Superior Court of the State of Washington for the County of King do hereby certify that I have compared the foregoing copy with the original ORDER OF DISCHARGE in the above entitled cause as the sae appears on file in my office and the same is true and perfect trascript of said original and of the whole therof.
In Testimony Wherof, I have herento set my gandand afficed the Seal of said Superior Court at my office at Seattle this 26th day of October, 1916
W.K. ICKELES, CLERK By Pearl G. Hornick DEPUTY CLERK
IN THE Superior Court of State of Washington FOR THE COUNTY OF KING
IN THE MATTER OF THE WELFARE OF GLADYS HAWK Ward of Court.
CERTIFIED COPY OF ORDER OF DISCHERGE.
